main event: A witness reported seeing a large, silvery object appear out of the sky and hover a few feet above the ground before quickly disappearing behind some trees. The area reportedly experienced electrical and magnetic disturbances, affecting TV and radio signals.
interesting points: The witness was not the one who directly observed the object, but was contacted by someone who did and needed guidance on how to report the incident.
The witness was a retired Air Force Master Sergeant who was called at 11:32 PM on the night of the incident.
The local commanding officer was informed about the incident since it occurred within their area of responsibility.
The object was described as a 'huge silvery object' that appeared from the sky and moved very quickly before disappearing.
There were reports of electrical and magnetic disturbances in the area, affecting TV and radio signals.
witnesses: witness was a retired Air Force Master Sergeant, who was contacted by the original witness
photographs: no photographs included in the report
